select concat(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) as user, dfs.id, dfs.id_schedule, dfs.shift, dfs.task, dfs.time, dfs.time_from, dfs.time_to, s.date_schedule from detailfinalschedule dfs, schedule s, user u where dfs.id_schedule = s.id and s.user = u.id
and (u.firstname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.lastname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})
and (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})

select concat(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) as user, dfs.id, dfs.id_schedule, dfs.shift, dfs.task, dfs.time, s.date_schedule from detailinitialschedule dfs, schedule s, user u where dfs.id_schedule = s.id and s.user = u.id
and (u.firstname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.lastname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
and (dfs.shift = #{shift_number})

select max(d.date_schedule) as date_break from schedule d, usershift s where d.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from} and d.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s.break_shift = 1 and d.shift = s.id and d.id_user = #{id_user}

select sum(d_1.time) from schedule s_1, detailinitialschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s_1.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from}

select sum(d_1.time) from schedule s_1, detailfinalschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule_to} and s_1.date_schedule >= #{date_schedule_from}

select d_1.shift, sum(d_1.time) / (select sum(d_2.time) as global_sum from schedule s_2, detailinitialschedule d_2 where s_2.user = #{id_user} and s_2.id = d_2.id_schedule and s_2.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule}) * 100 as rate from schedule s_1, detailinitialschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} group by d_1.shift order by rate asc

select d_1.shift, sum(d_1.time) / (select sum(d_2.time) as global_sum from schedule s_2, detailfinalschedule d_2 where s_2.user = #{id_user} and s_2.id = d_2.id_schedule and s_2.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule}) * 100 as rate from schedule s_1, detailfinalschedule d_1 where s_1.user = #{id_user} and s_1.id = d_1.id_schedule and s_1.date_schedule <= #{date_schedule} group by d_1.shift order by rate asc

select count(ds.user) / (select count(dd.user) from schedule dd, usershift uu where DAYOFWEEK(dd.date_schedule) = 1 and uu.presence = 1 and dd.shift = uu.id) * 100 as perc from schedule ds, usershift us where ds.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and DAYOFWEEK(ds.date_schedule) = 1 and ds.user = #{id_user}

select count(s.id) / (select count(s.id) from schedule s, usershift us where s.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and (date_format(s.date_schedule, '%m-%d') in ('01-01' , '01-06', '04-25', '05-01', '06-02', '08-15', '11-01', '12-08', '12-25', '12-26') or DAYOFWEEK(s.date_schedule) = 1)) * 100 as perc from schedule s, usershift us where s.user = #{id_user} and s.shift = us.id and us.presence = 1 and (date_format(s.date_schedule, '%m-%d') in ('01-01' , '01-06', '04-25', '05-01', '06-02', '08-15', '11-01', '12-08', '12-25', '12-26') or DAYOFWEEK(s.date_schedule) = 1)
